title: Train fault at Buona Vista causing delays

updates.text: [EWL] Cleared: train service from Cityhall to JooKoon Westbound is running normally.
Trains will be traveling slower from Cityhall to JooKoon due to an earlier train fault at Buona Vista Westbound
Due to train fault at Buona Vista, please expect additional 15mins traveling time from Cityhall to JooKoon Westbound.
